channel.title: my brain on
channel.description: Recent content in my brain on

item.title: Backlink Example
item.description: This is an example of how backlinks will work on this site. Here, we’re linking to the first post, giving us the ability to see it in our graph, see it in the backlinks, and watch a preview.

item.title: What is this?
item.description: This is my attempt at creating a refuge on the internet. A place where I can explore new & interesting ideas in a public way, while building a cruft of knowledge over time.
